name: Lickitung

ability.name: Sushi Sampler
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may discard a Water Pokemon from your hand. If you do, remove 2 damage counters from Lickitung.

attacks.name: Lick
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If Heads, the Defending Pokemon is Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Seek Out
attacks.effect: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Water Pokemon, use the Sushi Sampler ability immediately (even if you've already used it). Otherwise, draw it.

flavor: They love sushi. They're smart enough to pay, but sushi owners still don't like them, since customers down the belt from them will wind up hungry.
